ABOUT

I currently work as Scrum Master & Project Manager at StubHub, an eBay company. Previously, I was the IT Recruiter of Ticketbis, the Spanish startup ticketing marketplace acquired by eBay in 2016. I worked also as Programmer/Analyst/Team Lead in consulting firms (everybody has a past! :)

Academia

  • BSc in Physics (Solid State Phys.) (Univ. of the Basque Country).
  • Master in Business Administration, MBA (IESE Business School).
  •   Master in Computational Engineering and Intelligent Systems (Univ. of the Basque Country, WIP).

Other courses

  • Codeschool: 7 completed courses.

Languages

  • Chinese: HSK2, Hanban Institute. A2 level.
